options.content:
MTM - MDS Traffic Monitoring

Detailed Switch Monitoring

targets.query: SELECT last("switchname"),location FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("switchname") as "Switchname" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter
select switch as "Switch Address" from (SELECT last("switchname"),switch  FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter) where $timeFilter
SELECT last("chassis_id") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("sys_ver") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter
select count(last) from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '') and $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter
select count(last) from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" = '') and $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport) where $timeFilter
SELECT mean("cpu_kernel") as "Kernel - % CPU" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)
SELECT mean("cpu_user") as "User - % CPU" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)
SELECT mean("load_avg_1min") as "Load" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("mem_used")/last("mem_total")*100 FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT description as "Description", oper_state as "Operational State", port_down_reason as "Down Reason", oper_mode as "Oper Mode", oper_speed as "Speed (G)", pc as "Member of Port-Channel", pwwn as "PWWN" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY switch,switchport order by time desc limit 1
SELECT mean("cpu_user") AS "CPU User", mean("cpu_kernel") AS "CPU Kernel" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT (mean(mem_used)/mean(mem_total)) as "Mem Used %" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("kernel_uptime") AS "Uptime" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT mean(response_time) as "Response Time" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter group by time($__interval)
SELECT last("sys_uptime") AS "Uptime" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Switches" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/) AND $timeFilter

select count(last) AS "Up" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_state != 'down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Down" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_state = 'down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Admin Down" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" = 'Administratively down') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Link failure or not-connected" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" = 'Link failure or not-connected') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "SFP not present" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" = 'SFP not present') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "Error disabled" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "port_down_reason" =~ /Error disabled/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "32G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 32) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 16) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 8) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "10G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 4) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "2G" from (SELECT last("oper_speed") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 2) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "TF" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_mode = 'TF') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "F" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_mode = 'F') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(last) AS "TE" from (SELECT last("crc") FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND "pc" != '' and oper_mode = 'TE') and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),switch,switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select sum("RX Traffic") as "Total RX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))*8/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ and pc != '' and oper_state != 'down') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("TX Traffic") as "Total TX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))*8/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE ("switch" =~ /^$switch$/ and pc != '' and oper_state != 'down') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]]),switchport) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total TxWait" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(txwait))*2.5/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Tx B2B Transition to 0" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Rx B2B Transition to 0" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total CRC" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(crc))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed_mean)  as "RX % Utilization" from (SELECT ((non_negative_difference(mean(rx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8/(mean(oper_speed)*1000000000*[[fc_data_rate]]))*100  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed_mean)  as "TX % Utilization" from (SELECT ((non_negative_difference(mean(tx_bytes))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s))*8/(mean(oper_speed)*1000000000*[[fc_data_rate]]))*100  FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "TxWait" from (SELECT (non_negative_difference(mean(txwait))*2.5)/(elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s)*1000000) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter group by switchport

select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) as "Tx B2B Transition to 0" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean(non_negative_difference_elapsed) as "Rx B2B Transition to 0" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_b2b_credit_to_zero))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "CRC" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval) fill(null)) where $timeFilter group by switchport

select top("last",switchport,10) as "SFP Temperature" from (SELECT last(sfp_temperature) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport) where $timeFilter

select bottom("last",switchport,10) as "SFP Temperature" from (SELECT last(sfp_temperature) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport) where $timeFilter

select bottom("last",switchport,10) as "SFP Rx Power" from (SELECT last(sfp_rx_pwr) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and oper_state != 'down' and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport) where $timeFilter

select bottom("last",switchport,10) as "SFP Tx Power" from (SELECT last(sfp_tx_pwr) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and oper_state != 'down' and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport) where $timeFilter

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Timeout Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(timeout_discards))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Rx Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Tx Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total FEC Corrected" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_corrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval) fill(linear)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms)

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total FEC Uncorrected" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_uncorrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total ITW" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(itw))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval) fill(linear)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval_ms]]ms)

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Timeout Discards" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(timeout_discards))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Rx Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "TX Discard" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_discard))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "FEC Corrected" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_corrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "FEC Uncorrected" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(fec_uncorrected))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Invalid Transmission Words" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(itw))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Link Failure" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(link_failures))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Signal Loss" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(signal_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total Sync Loss" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(sync_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total RX LR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total TX LR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total RX LRR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select sum("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Total TX LRR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time([[__interval]])

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Link Failure" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(link_failures))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Signal Loss" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(signal_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "Sync Loss" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(sync_loss))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "RX LR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "TX LR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "RX LRR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(rx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

select mean("non_negative_difference_elapsed") as "TX LRR" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(mean(tx_lrr))/elapsed(mean(oper_speed),1s) FROM "$db"."$rp"."SwitchPortStats" WHERE "pc" != '' and "oper_state" != 'down'  and "switch" =~ /^$switch$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport,time($__interval)) where $timeFilter GROUP BY switchport

list.label: Switch
list.name: switch
list.query: show tag values from  "$db"."$rp"."Switches" with key=switch  WHERE $timeFilter

list.name: min_interval
list.query: select last(elapsed) from (select elapsed(switchname,1s) from "$db"."$rp"."Switches" where switch =~ /$switch/)
